title: Roger C. Schank, Theorist of Artificial Intelligence, Dies at 76
description: He combined linguistics, cognitive science and computing with the goal of “trying to understand the nature of the human mind.”

title: Supreme Court to Hear Case That Targets a Legal Shield of Tech Giants
description: The justices are set to hear a case challenging Section 230, a law that protects Google, Facebook and others from lawsuits over what their users post online.

title: Facebook Parent Plans to Sell ‘Meta Verified’ Accounts
description: Meta announced that it would begin charging $11.99 a month for a blue badge on Facebook and Instagram.
